item.title: Paul Robeson - Sometimes I Feel Like A Motherless Child
item.description:
For educational use. Optimized for GCEA Ukulele. Key of Am.
As recorded by Paul Robeson. One of the songs included in the Tampa Bay Ukulele Society Beginner Handbook.
Created on the iPad Pro with Luma Fusion, ukulele chords are from Chordette for Education, available from ukefarm.com. You can install custom fonts on your iPad with Any Font (app)
